get.description: Specifies a route that is only available to GET requests.

post.description: Specifies a route that is only available to POST requests.

put.description: Specifies a route that is only available to PUT requests.

delete.description: Specifies a route that is only available to DELETE requests.

head.description: Specifies a route that is only available to HEAD requests.

patch.description: Specifies a route that is only available to PATCH requests.

options.description: Specifies a route that is only available to OPTIONS requests.

cli.description: Specifies a route that is only available to command-line requests.

add.description: Adds a single route to the collection.

view.description: Specifies a route that will only display a view.

addPlaceholder.description: Registers a new constraint with the system.

presenter.description: Creates a collections of HTTP-verb based routes for a presenter controller.

resource.description: Creates a collections of HTTP-verb based routes for a controller.

match.description: Specifies a single route to match for multiple HTTP Verbs.

addRedirect.description: Adds a temporary redirect from one route to another.

map.description: A shortcut method to add a number of routes at a single time.

setPrioritize.description: Enable or Disable sorting routes by priority.

setTranslateURIDashes.description: Tells the system whether to convert dashes in URI strings into underscores.

setAutoRoute.description: If TRUE, the system will attempt to match the URI against Controllers by matching each segment against folders/files in APPPATH/Controllers, when a match wasn't found against defined routes.

setDefaultNamespace.description: Sets the default namespace to use for Controllers when no other namespace has been specified.

setDefaultController.description: Sets the default controller to use when no other controller has been specified.

setDefaultMethod.description: Sets the default method to call on the controller when no other method has been set in the route.

environment.description: Limits the routes to a specified ENVIRONMENT or they won't run.

group.description: Group a series of routes under a single URL segment.

loadRoutes.description: Loads main routes file and discover routes.

set404Override.description: ets the class/method that should be called if routing doesn't find a match. It can be either a closure or the controller/method name exactly like a route is defined: Users: :index.

get404Override.description: Returns the 404 Override setting, which can be null, a closure or the controller/string.

setDefaultConstraint.description: Sets the default constraint to be used in the system. Typically for use with the 'resource' method.

getDefaultController.description: Returns the name of the default controller. With Namespace.

getDefaultMethod.description: Returns the name of the default method to use within the controller.

getDefaultNamespace.description: Returns the default namespace as set in the Routes config file.

shouldTranslateURIDashes.description: Returns the current value of the translateURIDashes setting.

shouldAutoRoute.description: Returns the flag that tells whether to autoRoute URI against Controllers.

getRoutes.description: Returns the raw array of available routes.

getRoutesOptions.description: Returns one or all routes options.

getHTTPVerb.description: Returns the current HTTP Verb being used.

setHTTPVerb.description: Sets the current HTTP verb. Used primarily for testing.

isRedirect.description: Determines if the route is a redirecting route.

getRedirectCode.description: Grabs the HTTP status code from a redirecting Route.

reverseRoute.description: Attempts to look up a route based on its destination.

isFiltered.description: Checks a route (using the "from") to see if it's filtered or not.

getFilterForRoute.description: Returns the filter that should be applied for a single route, along with any parameters it might have.

getFiltersForRoute.description: Returns the filters that should be applied for a single route, along with any parameters it might have.

resetRoutes.description: Reset the routes, so that a test case can provide the explicit ones needed for it.

getRegisteredControllers.description: Get all controllers in Route Handlers.

useSupportedLocalesOnly.description: Set The flag that limit or not the routes with {locale} placeholder to App::$supportedLocales.

shouldUseSupportedLocalesOnly.description: Get the flag that limit or not the routes with {locale} placeholder to App::$supportedLocales.
